detail_desc: High-waisted velvet trousers with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and straight, wide legs.
Long-sleeved body in cotton jersey with a V-neck, wrapover front and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Short, wide jersey top with short sleeves and a low-cut, wrapover back with a horizontal strap at the back of the neck.
Joggers in soft, patterned jersey with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, thin shoulder pads, welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with a short slit at the cuffs. No fasteners. Lined.

Pull-on trousers in a textured weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Gently tapered legs with short slits at the hems.
V-neck T-shirt in cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
V-neck T-shirt in cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Calf-length, sleeveless dress in heavily draping chiffon with plastic bead fringes. Adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and a slit at the back. Satin lining.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline, long sleeves and a rounded hem.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline, long sleeves and a rounded hem.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline, long sleeves and a rounded hem.

Short, wide dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a small stand-up collar and an opening with ties at the front. Long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, a seam at the hips and a gently flared skirt. Jersey underdress with adjustable shoulder straps.

Short, wide dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a small stand-up collar and an opening with ties at the front. Long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, a seam at the hips and a gently flared skirt. Jersey underdress with adjustable shoulder straps.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Adjustable bracelets in patterned fabric with a metal pendant.
Plastic sunglasses with cat ears on the frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Aviator-style sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and UV-protective, mirrored lenses.
Knee-length dressing gown in soft fleece with a hood, patch front pockets and a tie belt at the waist.
Earmuffs in faux fur with an imitation leather headband.

Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders with raw-edge seams and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a rounded, ribbed hem. Longer at the back.

Boxy jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a boat neck and buttons on one shoulder. Low dropped shoulders, decorative buttons down one sleeve and ribbing around the neckline, down the sleeves and at the cuffs. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Calf-length skirt in a soft knit containing some wool. Faux wrapover with decorative buttons and a slit at the front, and wide, elasticated ribbing at the waist. The polyester content of the skirt is recycled.
Short top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved T-shirt in soft cotton jersey in a relaxed, boxy fit with dropped shoulders.
Short-sleeved T-shirt in soft cotton jersey in a relaxed, boxy fit with dropped shoulders.
Fitted T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves. Contrasting colour trim around the sleeves and neckline.
Fitted T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves. Contrasting colour trim around the sleeves and neckline.
Fitted T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves. Contrasting colour trim around the sleeves and neckline.
Fitted T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves. Contrasting colour trim around the sleeves and neckline.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck with a wide flounced trim that continues down the front, a gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Lined.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck with a wide flounced trim that continues down the front, a gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Lined.

Triangle bikini top with laser-cut scalloped edges and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways and an adjustable metal hook fastening at the back.

Triangle bikini top with laser-cut scalloped edges and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways and an adjustable metal hook fastening at the back.
Glittery swimming goggles with decorative rubber appliqués and an adjustable silicone strap at the back.
Loose-fitting, V-neck top in soft viscose jersey with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Loose-fitting, V-neck top in soft viscose jersey with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Loose-fitting, V-neck top in soft viscose jersey with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Loose-fitting, V-neck top in soft viscose jersey with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Cold shoulder top in soft viscose jersey with a raw roll edge at the top, narrow shoulder straps, short sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Cold shoulder top in soft viscose jersey with a raw roll edge at the top, narrow shoulder straps, short sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable fabric with a rounded collar and detachable, lined hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, flap patch pockets with a press-stud at the front, and ribbing at the cuffs. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable fabric with a rounded collar and detachable, lined hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, flap patch pockets with a press-stud at the front, and ribbing at the cuffs. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned, organic cotton jersey with elastication at the top and narrow shoulder straps with sewn-on bows. Short legs, press-studs at the crotch and elastication with a narrow frill trim at the hems.
Round, braided shoulder bag with an embroidered motif. Tie fastening with wooden beads on the ends. Unlined. Width 5 cm, diameter 24 cm.
Hat knitted in soft cashmere with a roll edge.

Thin metal chain necklaces in different designs with pendants. Adjustable length from 40-48 cm and 53-61 cm.
Body in soft, patterned viscose jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a zip at the top and press-studs at the crotch.

Short, straight-cut dress in jersey with faceted sparkly stones at the top and a round neckline with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck. Short butterfly sleeves that are slightly longer at the back. Lined.

Suit trousers in a soft linen blend with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Suit trousers in a soft linen blend with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Long nightshirt in soft cotton flannel with notch lapels, a chest pocket with embroidery, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
